title: Priority Task Queue
description: Build a simple priority-based task queue that processes tasks in priority order.
instructions: Create a Task data class with name and priority (Int, lower = higher priority). Create a TaskQueue class that adds tasks and processes them in priority order. Print each task as it's processed.

hints.text: Use a data class Task(val name: String, val priority: Int)
Sort tasks by priority before processing

commonMistakes.correction: Sort the task list by priority before processing
Lower priority number = higher priority, use ascending sort
Sort into a new list or sort before iterating
